content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction area
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) for coal extraction

### Iron plate factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1) for crafting iron sticks and iron gear wheels
- Inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position b) that connects the furnace to the assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, iron-plate is needed for crafting iron-gear-wheel.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing it.

### Errors when crafting without a required machine
- Verify that you are using the correct crafting machine or furnace required for the recipe you are attempting to craft.
